# Check AEU data

**Purpose:** Code to check AEU data for errors

**Author:** Perry ([sarah.perry\@water.ca.gov](mailto:sarah.perry@water.ca.gov){.email})

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(vegan)
library(lubridate)
source('admin/global_functions/global_funcs.R')
source('admin/global_functions/check_funcs.R')
```

```{r}
# format main dataframe (species unit)
df_phyto <- read_quiet_csv(abs_pesp_path('Groups/USBR-DOP/02 Program Data/DOP_program_draft.csv')) %>%
  mutate(Date = parse_date_time(Date, orders = c('ymd', 'dmy', 'mdy')),
         Year = factor(year(Date)),
         Event = paste(Date, ICF_ID, sep = '_'),
         Binary = 1) %>%
  rename('Station' = 'ICF_ID') %>%
  filter(Event != '2019-11-14_ICF1729' & Event != '2021-04-01_ICF3129')

# format df (genus unit)
df_genus <- df_phyto %>%
  group_by(Date, Year, Event, Station, Genus, SiteDepth) %>%
  summarize(Cells_per_mL = sum(Cells_per_mL),
            .groups = 'drop') %>%
  mutate(Binary = 1)
```

# NMDS by Genus and Event

### Cells
```{r}
# create NMDS
df_nmds_cell <- calc_nmds(df_genus,
                      taxa_var = 'Genus',                    
                      group_var = 'Event',
                      factor_var = 'Year',
                      nmds_var = 'Cells_per_mL')

# print plot
plt_nmds <- plot_nmds(df_nmds_cell$df_nmds, df_nmds_cell$meta_vars, fill_var = 'Year')
plt_nmds

ggsave(
  filename = abs_pesp_path('Groups/USBR-DOP/02 Program Data/QC files/graphs/DOP-Prog_Genus_Cells_Year.jpg'),
  plot = plt_nmds,
  width = 8,
  height = 6
)
```

### PA
```{r}
# create NMDS
df_nmds_pa <- calc_nmds(df_genus,
                      taxa_var = 'Genus',                    
                      group_var = 'Event',
                      factor_var = 'Year',
                      nmds_var = 'Binary',
                      distance = 'jaccard')

# print plot
plt_nmds <- plot_nmds(df_nmds_pa$df_nmds, df_nmds_pa$meta_vars, fill_var = 'Year')
plt_nmds

ggsave(
  filename = abs_pesp_path('Groups/USBR-DOP/02 Program Data/QC files/graphs/DOP-Prog_Genus_PA_Year.jpg'),
  plot = plt_nmds,
  width = 8,
  height = 6
)
```
